text: Function type Central questions Common to all types | « How should the function be implemented as operations in different classes? + How is the main operation activated and what input data does it use? e Which objects and connections are involved in performing the operations, and how are they identified? + What is the feedback from the main operation? + How can you determine if the update is legal? « Which attributes and connections should be read, and how are these found? + Which rules apply to the signaling?
